_xResult.title: Indestructible Flower Maxi Dress
_xResult.shortdesc: Custom made floor-length textured linen dress with v-neck
_xResult.longdesc:
Beautiful enough to be a wedding gown, but versatile enough to be an everyday elegance dress. Wear it bare for summer, or layer for chillier weather.

 

Once you buy your first Aiste design, you'll be hooked. She is a true artisan, and works with high quality and sustainable fabrics. In order to add more structure and visual interest to the linen fabric, it's first stitched with intricate textures. Then the garment is produced specific to your measurements so that it perfectly fits you and your curves. Note that the textured diagonal lines on the bodice of this custom made linen dress streamline your top half, and the cross-hatch texture pattern on the bottom adds weight and flow. You'll draw every eye when you walk into a room, along the sea shore, or even just down the street to the market. 

 

Did you know? Linen naturally repels dirt! So you have to wash it less often. The planet will thank you! For custom made requests, let Aiste know your wildest desires using the button below.

properties.propvalue: Hand wash cold, hang dry. Dry clean ok.
